Vendor: Wireless Xplosion

  • TP-Link Tapo Smart Plug Mini, Smart Home Wifi Outlet Compatible with Alexa Echo & Google Home, No Hub Required, New Tapo APP Needed (P100 4-pack)

  • Easy Setup: Setup is quick and simple using Bluetooth and the friendly Tapo app.

entry.title: Steren Power Strip - 6 outlet, 2.5 meter cable
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wireless Xplosion
Type: Gadgets
Price: 11.99

The power strip has 6 outlets and 2.5-meter cable length, perfect to reach those places you need to power. The outlets are grounded and have protection against voltage peaks and overloads, plus a lighted on / off switch.

Specifications :

  • Electric Current : 125 V - 60 Hz 15 A
  • Supression rating : 90 - joules
  • RH : 10-80% non-condensed
  • Operating temperature : - 10 to 50 °C
  • Consumption : 1.4 W/h
  • Stand-by- power consumption : Not applicable

entry.title: Kensington LM150 Backpack up to 15.6” laptops, 11” tablets and smartphones
entry.summary:
Vendor: Laptop Bags
Type: Phone
Price: 24.99

Product Description:

  • When it comes to contemporary style for the modern young professional, the LM150 Backpack has all the elements for success.
  • Padded pockets allow you to safely store your laptop and tablet in snug sections to keep them from shifting around while you’re on the go.
  • There’s plenty of room for all your accessories, with a variety of pockets that let you store your items.
  • A specially designed pass-thru at the top of the backpack is perfect when you want to listen to music.
  • Simply stow your device inside the backpack and run your earbuds through the hole so the cord stays inside your bag.
  • There’s also ergonomic cushioning on the back so you can carry a fully loaded backpack with less stress

entry.title: HP Business 4-Wheel Roller Case for Notebooks up to 17.3” – Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Laptop Bags
Type: Phone
Price: 89.90

Speed through your day, in the office, on the road, and in the air with the HP 17.3 Business Roller Case, a notebook case with a retractable handle and four rolling wheels. Help keep your notebook up to 17.3" diagonal and personal items safe with lockable zippers and a secure RFID pocket.

Features

Secure inside and out

Put a buffer between your personal information and electronic pickpockets with an RFID pocket that helps protect the data encoded on credit cards and passports. Deter tampering and access to your notebook with double-coil, lockable zippers.

Clutter-free carryall

Pack it all in and stay organized with a dedicated, padded notebook compartment and plenty of slip and zip pockets for all your accessories.

Roll with it

Use the adjustable retractable handle to find your comfortable height, and enjoy effortless vertical rolling with four wheels that allow you to walk with the bag alongside, in front of or behind you.

About this product

The M-Edge Tech Pack keeps you charged and connected from the playing field to the classroom. The Tech Pack has enough room for all your gear with a built-in battery. The included battery and patent-pending exterior battery interface has the power to charge your phone or tablet on the go.

    Features :
  • Provides an additional 40 hours of battery life for your smartphone or 10 hours for your tablet
  • Patent-pending USB interface on exterior of bag that allows you to charge your phone or tablet on-the-go

  • Fits up to a 15" laptop

USB Microphone Kit
  • Acrylic mirror mute key, and the built-in LED Indicator lights to tell you the working status
